Text: Thanks for posting Saturn. Please don't stop just because I am double posting. I am not sure I am going to keep it up if people don't want it.

Nicodemus, I didn't realize you were posting.  If you are posting the official releases with the 4th hour, I can tell you that your services would be greatly desired.  What time are the files available for you to download (include time zone)?

glennbeck.com generally releases the podcasts about 15-20 mins after each hour.  All 4 hours are generally available about 1:20 pm EST. Since I wait for the 4th hour to be posted before I put up the torrent, I can generally get the torrent up around 1:30 pm EST. Each hour of the podcast is actually available much earlier, but I wouldn't want to post them as individual hours - it just doesn't make much sense.
